Package org.slim3.util

Slim3 utilities.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Cleanable This interface represents a resource that must be cleaned.
Converter An interface that converts string and object.
 

Class Summary
ArrayMap<K,V> A map acts like array.
BeanDesc This class describes bean information.
BeanMap A map like bean.
BeanUtil A utility class for bean.
BigDecimalUtil A utility class for BigDecimal.
BooleanUtil A utility class for Boolean.
ByteUtil A utility class for Byte.
CaseInsensitiveMap<V> This map is case insensitive to the key.
ClassUtil A utility class for Class.
Cleaner A utility class to clean cached resources.
ConversionUtil A utility class for conversion.
CopyOptions A copy options.
DateConverter The converter for date.
DateUtil A utility class for Date.
DoubleUtil A utility class for Double.
FloatUtil A utility class for Float.
GenericsUtil A utility class for generics.
IntegerUtil A utility class for Integer.
IteratorEnumeration<T> A class to use Iterator as Enumeration.
LongUtil A utility class for Long.
NumberConverter A converter for number.
NumberUtil A utility class for Number.
ParameterizedClassDesc This class describes a parameterized class.
PropertyDesc This class describes a property.
RuntimeExceptionUtil A utility class for RuntimeException.
ShortUtil A utility class for Short.
StringUtil A utility class for String.
